name: stormy.ai
headline: Influencer marketing on autopilot
description:
Influencer marketing is a pain to set up. Founders spend hours scrolling the feed, DMing content creators, negotiating deals and paying them.

We hated that process. So we fully automated it with AI.

Now, you can focus on building and let Stormy handle the distribution!

founders.name: Robert Lukoshko, Founder
founders.description: Building new paradigm of local context collection for AI.

founders.name: Alex Pokras, Founder
founders.description:
Automating influencer marketing. Hit me up to ramp up that growth before Demo Day!
Previous nonprofit AI startup: 150+ members, $200k+ ARR.
Ex-MIT.

generated_description:
**Stormy.ai: Automating Influencer Marketing** 

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, Stormy.ai is tackling the notoriously tedious process of influencer marketing. If you’ve ever spent countless hours scrolling social media, sliding into DMs, negotiating deals, and worrying about payments, then you know the pain that Stormy aims to alleviate. 

The company operates on a clear mission: to put influencer marketing on autopilot. By leveraging artificial intelligence, they’ve created a solution that automates the entire process, allowing brands to focus on what truly matters—their business and creative direction—while Stormy manages the distribution of their marketing efforts.

As a participant in Y Combinator’s Batch S24, Stormy.ai is positioned within a dynamic startup ecosystem, backed by experienced partners like Garry Tan. With a lean team of just two employees, they exemplify the agility of startups that can deliver powerful solutions without the need for a large workforce.

Their focus on areas such as SaaS, B2B, marketing, and AI indicates a modern approach to solving a common problem in the marketing landscape. For brands looking to streamline their influencer campaigns, Stormy.ai offers an appealing alternative to the traditional, labor-intensive methods, essentially allowing companies to optimize their outreach with less effort.

In summary, if influencer marketing feels overwhelming, Stormy.ai is here to turn that chaos into clarity, offering a smart, automated solution designed for today’s fast-paced digital world. For more information, you can check out their website at [stormy.ai](https://stormy.ai).
